#### M02 - Damage And / Or Theft Of Additional Accessories
The indemnity provided by Section I of this Policy extends to any claim by the Policyholder for the cost of repair and/or replacement of any additional Accessories installed in the Insured Vehicle following damage and/or theft of the same (provided there is no further damage to the Insured Vehicle) up to an amount not exceeding S$1,000 without the loss of the No Claim Discount nor the application of any Excess imposed under the Policy. We will not cover any additional Accessories exceeding S$1,000, unless You inform Us about them and We agree. In that event, there may be an extra premium to be paid for extending the coverage for these additional Accessories.
questions: How does the policy cover repair or replacement costs for additional Accessories installed in the Insured Vehicle when damage or theft occurs without further damage to the vehicle, and what is the maximum indemnity limit?
Under what conditions can the cost of additional Accessories exceeding S$1,000 be covered, and what are the implications regarding premium and insurer agreement?
In the event of damage or theft of additional Accessories, how does the policy treat the No Claim Discount and Excess charges?
What documentation or notification requirements must the Policyholder fulfill to extend coverage for additional Accessories valued above S$1,000?
How does the policy define 'additional Accessories' in relation to the Insured Vehicle, and are there any exclusions if the vehicle itself is damaged?
If additional Accessories are stolen but the Insured Vehicle remains undamaged, how does the policy determine the claim amount and coverage limits?
What happens if the Policyholder fails to inform the insurer about additional Accessories exceeding S$1,000 before a claim event?
How does the indemnity for additional Accessories interact with the overall Section I coverage of the policy?
Are there any scenarios under which the Excess or No Claim Discount would apply to claims involving additional Accessories despite the stated waiver?
If the Policyholder installs new additional Accessories after the policy inception, what steps must be taken to ensure coverage under this section?
How does the policy handle claims for multiple additional Accessories whose combined value exceeds S$1,000 but individually are below the limit?
In cases where additional Accessories are damaged but the Insured Vehicle has minor damage, does the policy still cover the Accessories under this clause?
What are the financial consequences for the Policyholder if they choose to extend coverage for additional Accessories beyond the standard S$1,000 limit?
How does the policy address repair versus replacement costs for additional Accessories, and are there any limits or preferences stated?
Is there any indication in the policy about the timing or reporting requirements for claims involving additional Accessories damage or theft?
How does the policy ensure that claims for additional Accessories do not affect the Policyholder's Excess or No Claim Discount, and are there exceptions?
What is the insurer's discretion or process for agreeing to cover additional Accessories exceeding S$1,000, and how might this affect the policy terms?
Does the policy specify whether coverage for additional Accessories applies to both factory-installed and aftermarket-installed items?
In the event of theft of additional Accessories, what proof or evidence might the insurer require to process the claim under this section?
How does this section's coverage for additional Accessories interact with any general exclusions or other sections of the policy that might limit theft or damage claims?
